trans-unit.source: Enables you to create contracts in the connected system for a target quantity or value up to the total that you set in the central contract.

seg-source.mrk: Enables you to create contracts in the connected system for a target quantity or value up to the total that you set in the central contract.

target.mrk: 目標数量または中央購買契約で設定した合計までの値で、接続済システムに契約を登録できます。

trans-unit.source: The <uicontrol>Flexible Distribution</uicontrol> feature enables you to create contracts in the connected system for a target quantity or value up to the total that you set in the central contract. Instead of assigning a fixed share of the quantity or value of the central contract to each of your subsidiaries, you can set the distribution percentage for each connected system to 100%. As a result, the respective purchasers at each of your subsidiaries can create putchase orders in the connected system for as for as large or small a share as they need, rather than being limited to a fixed share that was predetermined by the central contract.

seg-source.mrk: The <uicontrol>Flexible Distribution</uicontrol> feature enables you to create contracts in the connected system for a target quantity or value up to the total that you set in the central contract.
Instead of assigning a fixed share of the quantity or value of the central contract to each of your subsidiaries, you can set the distribution percentage for each connected system to 100%.

As a result, the respective purchasers at each of your subsidiaries can create putchase orders in the connected system for as for as large or small a share as they need, rather than being limited to a fixed share that was predetermined by the central contract.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>フレキシブル配布</uicontrol>機能によって、目標数量または中央購買契約で設定した合計までの値で、接続済システムに契約を登録できます。
中央購買契約の数量または金額の固定比率を各子会社に割り当てるのではなく、各接続済システムの配賦率を 100% に設定することができます。
結果として、各子会社のそれぞれの購買担当者は、中央購買契約によって事前に設定された固定比率に制限されるのではなく、必要に応じて大規模または小規模な比率で、接続済システムで購買発注を登録することができます。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have two subsidiaries, rather than assign each subsidiary a fixed limit of 50%, you can assign each of them 100%. That way, if one subsidiary only creates purchase orders for 20% of the total value or quantity agreed in the central contract, the other subsidiary would have the flexibility to order up to 80% if they need to.

seg-source.mrk: For example, if you have two subsidiaries, rather than assign each subsidiary a fixed limit of 50%, you can assign each of them 100%.

That way, if one subsidiary only creates purchase orders for 20% of the total value or quantity agreed in the central contract, the other subsidiary would have the flexibility to order up to 80% if they need to.

target.mrk: たとえば、2 つの子会社が存在する場合、各子会社に固定制限 50% を割り当てるのではなく、各子会社に 100% を割り当てることができます。
これにより、1 つの子会社が、集中購買契約で合意された合計金額または合計数量の 20% の購買発注のみを登録する場合、その他の子会社は、必要に応じて 80% までを柔軟に注文します。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you enable flexible distribution, you will not receive an error message if the sum of the distribution exceeds 100%. Therefore, it is important that you monitor the situation to make sure that your subsidiaries do not create a total sum of purchase orders that exceeds 100%.

seg-source.mrk: Note that if you enable flexible distribution, you will not receive an error message if the sum of the distribution exceeds 100%.
Therefore, it is important that you monitor the situation to make sure that your subsidiaries do not create a total sum of purchase orders that exceeds 100%.

target.mrk: フレキシブル配賦を有効にすると、配賦の合計が 100% を超えてもエラーメッセージを受信しないことに注意してください。
そのため、子会社が 100% を超える購買発注合計を登録しないように、状況を監視することが重要です。
